This game is a masterpiece. But there is one thing VALVE need to do is making so you can play on a 1920x1080 resolution.
The game has held up terribly well. After 20 years, it still deserves every little bit of praise it got when it first released.

Absolute classic and still holds up today. For the most part superb level design, fun gunplay with a variety of unique weapons to use, interesting but simple story. Overall great game, and doesn't need any patching to run on modern hardware, works straight away. If you somehow haven't played this game and you own a PC, you owe it to yourself to play it.

A true classic that still holds up today.

[h1] The Good [/h1]
[list]
 [*] The soundtrack is full of bangers (The song that plays right after you put on the HEV suit changes the mood entirely. You're late for work, and now your PPE is playing this incredible song that makes everything feel amazing. Nothing could possibly go wrong now!)
 [*] The variety of weapons is a plus to me. Being able to adapt to combat based on the enemies you're up against is the better part of the gun play in the game (The constant idle animations are a bit of late 90's flair, and the shooting itself is more utilitarian than anything else)
[/list]
[h1] The Bad [/h1]
[list]
 [*] Some of the enemies in the game feel like more of a nuisance than a challenge that has to be overcome [spoiler] (the Barnacles and Houndeyes in particular) [/spoiler]
 [*] The healing pools / pods in Xen took way too long to heal back lost health (when I was actively needing to go and use them, I was really low on health with no suit power to take some of the damage, and sitting still for 30 or 45 seconds took me out of the game and broke the momentum of the levels)
[/list]
[h1] The Xen [/h1]
The Xen portion of the game does what it sets out to do (for the most part, to me anyway). It did feel a bit rushed (get in, kill the [spoiler] Not Man [/spoiler] , get out?). The environment felt alien and made me feel like I shouldn't be there. In the end, Xen is an OK part of a great game.

Игра мне понравилась. 
Хочу отметить, что Half Life является шутером от первого лица, то есть игра представляет игровой мир глазами главного героя - Гордона Фримена. 


1)У игры не плохой сюжет. 
Каждый игравший наверняка помнит радость, испытанную, когда он увидел долгожданную помощь морпехов, и удивление — когда выяснилось, что на самом деле военные пришли зачистить всех свидетелей инцидента. 

2) Разнообразие вооружения.
 Для борьбы с врагами игра предоставляет носимые с собой 14 видов оружия. Большинство из них имеют альтернативный вид стрельбы на (ПКМ). Моим любимым оружием является - Глюонная пушка и арболет с оптическим прицелом.


Перечислять минусы игры не стану, их предостаточно! (Начиная от мелких багов заканчивая застреванием в текстурах после загрузки автосохранения)

Но сейчас самый лучший вариант ознакомиться с. Half Life это пройти неофициальный Remake Black Mesa.

Even though I had never played Half-Life before 2019, I take a stand in saying that it sucks ass. There's definitely a distinction between a game that would come out nowadays and this piece. 

Story wise, there's not much to it in my opinion. Gameplay wise it's as much of a classic 'fast paced' fps as you're gonna get. There's unfortunately still a lot of bugs and I've had to bypass a couple of areas in which a specific feature didn't work by using 'sv_cheats 1' and 'noclip' in the console to fly through the walls or fly up to something because a fan didn't work

4/10, a nice classic fps but isn't aging very well in my opinion.

[h1] A MINHA MAIOR DECEPÇÃO COM A VALVE :/ [/h1]

Bom, eu sinceramente não sei como começar esta analise, sim Half life e um jogo INCRÍVEL!
Os Gráficos são bonitos, o jogo e bem funcional, Pra 1998 Claro!

O jogo e realmente bom pra 2020, mas ainda sim, desse 1998 todo mundo falando que este e um dos melhores jogos de todos os tempos, e eu confiava completamente na valve mesmo este sendo o primeiro jogo dela, e ganhando Varios prêmios de jogo do ano

Eu mal jogava os jogos dos anos 90, (talvez to mais acostumado com os jogos atuais), mas a Historia do jogo e Muito boa, Mas nada completamente inovador, tem Varios bugs em salas completamente normais, e este e o maior problema do jogo, bugs e historia um pouco tando longa demais, mas tirando isso o jogo e incrivel, ainda mais com o modo deathmath muito bom.

To mesmo jeito, não tenho tanta certeza se vale 20,69R$ ainda mais valendo o custo do jogo em 2020.
a jogos melhores da valve (NA MINHA OPINIÃO) com o preço de um jogo de 98, como o incrivel Portal 2 ou ate mesmo Half life 2.

Bom, esta foi minha analise de Half Life, se achou útil Obrigado :) , se não achou comenda o porque ai!

I can see why this game garnered such an immense amount of acclaim upon its release. Half-Life 1 is inarguably the father of the seamless modern first-person sci-fi narrative game. Lots of action keeps you pumped up as you understand the severity of Black Mesa's catastrophic situation. Just don't be afraid of the headcrabs in the vents, and you'll be dandy.

I don't get why this game was so popular?
* Levels are confusing mixmashes, with no sense of order to the facility.  You're basically in a big maze.
* The "story" is just a bare skeleton.  [spoiler]Why is the military so insistent on killing Freemen specifically?[/spoiler] I can't really give more complaints about the story than that, because that's pretty much the entire story.
* The middle levels blur together, too repetitive.  Turn a corner, shoot some aliens, more of the same crates, same walls, ...  There's some cool ideas here and there though.
A classic that still holds up even today
aged like a shockingly well for a fairly early 3D game. very very solid, definitely worth a play if you haven't touched it yet.
Se ainda não jogou, porque nem humano você é.

A painful experience. Terrible experience
My backstory with the game:
I tried to play half-life several times, but never got far. I remember the further i went into the story before black mesa was like the first time you meet the big fella that you electrocute and that's it.
When i got black mesa i finally gave the game another chance and got even further to chapter 13 approximately. Until i really got ♥♥♥♥♥♥ and abandoned the game.
What i feel
Right now im stressed, this game is so bad i had a worse time playing it than other competitive games i've tried (and this is not even a comp game is a SP game!). Its overall a terrible experience for a few reasons i proceed to ennumerate:
Pros:
-The Graphics are awesome compared to the original half-life.
-the sounds are great.
-The music is great.
-Scenarios are great.
-Allied AI its surprisingly effective unlike HL.
And that's every good thing the game has.
Cons:
-Extremely long, played 8 hours and got like 6 chapters to go (wouldnt be so bad if)
-Enemy AI has the aim of a csgo pro player
-Some areas are extremely difficult if you get tagged to low hp and hit a save point.
-Tedious gameplay, terrible plataformer
-Worst story ive seen so far in a game, a scientist that's involved in an experiment that fails and kills zombies, monsters and militars, that's it, nothing more deep than that, some CoD's have better story writing.
-Every second is painful, every single one, every death is unfair and every section is hell
-(Informative) I had to use noclip and godmode several times to avoid wrecking my pc, i used noclip when falling from a high plataform on chapter 10, not a big deal, but then had to use godmode in "surface tensions" bc i got stuck in a savepoint with 6 hp against 5 soldiers (clearly impossible, even if i killed the first and healed, 4 come after me) and the chopper on surface tensions as well. Also the game for some reason wouldnt start an event that would make a door open so i had to use noclip as well.
Finally, my game crashed, and i gave up trying to play this boring ♥♥♥♥

I just think this is an extremely overrated game, that for some reason was thought to be one of the best of all time, when its just one more generic shooter, maybe decent in 1998 but not more than that, 6 years later legends like GTA: San Andreas adn Cod4: Modern Warfare were released, being clearly better in every story aspect than this.
Sorry H-L lovers, someone had to say it, this game is ectremely
Overrated

Одна из первых моих игр в которые я поиграл. Хоть первая часть и является классикой мне больше понравилась вторая. Лично мне кажется что 1 халва немного затянута и в некоторых моментах довольно скучна. Иногда я даже забрасывал игру и возвращался спустя недели, а то и месяцы. Но тем не менее я очень полюбил сюжет франшизы именно с этой части. Игра классная и я рекомендую её пройти.

Lo he jugado miles veces, tanto su campaña, como multijugador, admito que esa gran mayoría de veces lo descargue pirata, pero si encuentras en oferta el pack de half life no dudes en comprarlo, disminuyamos la pirateria. Juego que no envejece con los años.

Шедевр и классика, это знать надо блять. Каждый уважающий себя игрок в компьютерные игры должен пройти этот путь с монтировкой в руках и стеклянными очками на переносице, каждый должен ёбнуть сверхъбейбика, каждый должен выпить пива с Барни, и каждый должен обкашлять вопросики с Г-маном. Гуд монин, мистээ Фримэнн.

This game is amazing even after 2 decades after it's release. I've personally beaten HL:Source since I had a problem with this one, but I plan to beat the original as well. The protagonist is amazing, he doesn't even have to talk to make you interested in his story. The story unfolds as you play, no cutscenes and very little dialogue compared to modern games. The ending feels very rewarding.

Mi sono innamorato di questo gioco provandolo su un vecchio pc con windows xp facendomi prendere dalla nostalgia. Comprato su steam e provato sul mio pc con windows 10 funziona senza problemi. Seguire il corso del racconto mi è piaciuto molto e ritrovarmi già dall'inizio in laboratori e in un'atmosfera molto film di fantascienza anni 90 è stato il colpo di grazia per me. Ho giocato l'intero gioco praticamente in due giorni o poco meno e sicuramente si può portare a termine in meno tempo, siccome ho trovato difficoltà con alcuni livelli in cui sono rimasto bloccato anche per mezz'ora.. e qui arriviamo alla difficoltà. Sicuramente è un gioco vecchio stampo e la sfida che il gioco ci pone è in alcuni punti ardua. Ci sono molti "puzzle" e a dire la verità sono anche ben elaborati e richiedono inventiva. I nemici sono ben caratterizzati e l'ia è furba. Diciamo che da questo gioco mi aspettavo molto meno, ma in realtà, anche in confronto alla sua età, regge il confronto ancora oggi (non tenendo conto della grafica).
